thread.title: Celebrities are crying over Adele's new song 'Hello'
thread.title_full: Celebrities are crying over Adele's new song 'Hello' - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Celebrities are crying over Adele's new song 'Hello'
text:
Adele had these celebrities at hello with the release of her first new song in three years.
Stars like Katy Perry and Lena Dunham couldn't contain their excitement (or their tears) over this morning's unveiling of "Hello," the first single off Adele's upcoming album, "25."
Hear that? It's the sound of the Internet quietly weeping.
Listen's to "hello" from @OfficialAdele once¿¿¿¿ pic.twitter.com/Ni8PGofJOW 
— KATY PERRY (@katyperry) October 23, 2015 already/forever @adele 
A video posted by Lena Dunham (@lenadunham) on Oct 23, 2015 at 12:58am PDT 
avoiding adele bc i don't want to experience emotion ¿¿¿¿
— Tavi Gevinson (@tavitulle) October 23, 2015 Huge song....love this girl... https://t.co/eSELjwgqN7 via youtube
— Russell Crowe (@russellcrowe) October 23, 2015 https://t.co/cokO9We4p6 - stunning - she looks like kate winslet a bit - #AdeleHello 
— Rosie (@Rosie) October 23, 2015 Stunning! Love the new #Hello by @Adele . '25' drops on Nov. 20. Video: https://t.co/GJFWDXThtU pic.twitter.com/NUwWyWEAY9 
— John Stamos (@JohnStamos) October 23, 2015 Hello @Adele you sound incredible!it was worth the wait.I love you&I love this. https://t.co/zt8br4gnoW and oh my god how beautiful you are
— Paloma Faith (@Palomafaith) October 23, 2015 Hallelujah.... @Adele !!! ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿
— kylie minogue (@kylieminogue) October 23, 2015 If there’s anything better than waking up to a new @Adele song, I don’t know what it is. Hello. https://t.co/YdtvV5ifE7 
— Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) October 23, 2015 Copyright
